name: Force power: Move
description: :lightside:: Move one object Silhouette 1 at Short range; may make ranged attacks with this power.

name: Force power: Enhance
description: :lightside:: Gain :success: or :advantage: (user's choice) on an Athletics, Coordination, or Resilience check; :lightside:: take a Force Leap action to jump horizontally or vertically to any location in Short range.

name: Force power: Foresee
description: Spend :lightside: to gain vague hints of events to come, up to a day into own future. Spend :lightside: to increase the number of days seen into future by 2. Spend :lightside: to gain more specific details.

name: Force power: Harm
description: May make a Harm Force power check against one engaged target. Spend :darkside: to inflict {Intellect} Wounds on the target, ignoring Soak. Spend :darkside: to increase wounds inflicted by {Intellect} (may activate this multiple times), and spend :darkside: to heal Wounds equal to Wounds inflicted.

name: Force power: Misdirect
description: :lightside:: Make one target within Short range unable to perceive one Silhoutte 1 object, or perceive one non-existent Silhoutte 1 object; spend :lightside::lightside: to create up to six additional illusory people or objects; spend :lightside: to increase the number of affected targets by 3.

name: Force power: Sense
description: :lightside:: Sense all living things within Short range. :lightside:: Sense the emotional state of one target within Short range. Ongoing effect, commit :force: upto Force rating to upgrade difficulty of at­tacks targeting the character once.

name: Force power: Influence
description: :lightside:: inflict 2 Strain on target in Short range. :lightside:: succeed at an opposed Discipline vs. Discipline check to force one target within Short range to adopt an emotional state, or believe something even if it is untrue, for four minutes or four rounds in combat.

name: Force power: Unleash
description: Make a Force power check targeting one enemy at Short range, roll a ranged attack as part of the pool, using :average: Discipline check instead of normal dif­ficulty. If the check is successful and generates :darkside::darkside: the attack deals 3 damage with a critical rating of 4, plus 1 additional damage per :success:. May spend :darkside: to increase damage by 3, and :darkside: to increase range to Medium.

name: On the Edge
description: Once per Force check, may suffer 1 Strain to use :darkside: result to generate :lightside:.

name: Projectile Guidance
description: When making a ranged attack with a concussion bow, a Ysanna hunter can add :force: to the check and spend :lightside: to give the attack the Pierce 3 quality.
